title: DiBanGu Satin Shirt and Tie Sets for Men Dress Shirts Long Sleeve Inner Contrast Men's Casual Button-Down Shirts S-3XL
description: 【Features】 Black Shirt and Tie Sets for men. Unique inner contrast design, simple and versatile solid color shirt, comes with matching tie and pocket square set
【3PCS】 Mens Formal Shirt + Tie + Hanky. Suitable for any casual and formal occasion such as wedding/party/prom/business/date/nightclub/concert. It's also a perfect holiday gift
【Size】 Black Mens Dress Shirts Long Sleeve, available in 6 sizes S, M, L, XL, 2XL, 3XL. Necktie Size: 3.15" (8cm) wide x 59" (150cm) Long. Handkerchief Size: 9" (23cm)
【Material】 Silk-Like Satin Fabric, lustrous, vivid color, light and wrinkle-free. Machine washable in cold water, hand wash recommended, do not bleach. Wearable in all seasons
【Design】 Black Dress Shirts for Men with paisley floral on collar/cuffs, turn down collar/left chest pocket/regular fit/button-down shirt. The buttons purposely match the color of the shirt
